name: Annoying 2048
description:
It's like the 2048 game you'd play on your phone, but in the third dimension, and also blocks can move in any direction.

The goal is to combine like blocks for as long as you can to make the highest number possible. 

However, you must be careful not to fall off of the edge yourself.

But you just might want to jump anyways because this is ANNOYING 2048.

This game was not made to be fun.

It was made to frustrate.

Are you up for the task?

This game was made in jest by Megan Truesdale.

Enjoy :)
